description:
The Forest team introduced Forest Explorer, an open-source, serverless faucet that enables developers to fund their wallets for testing purposes quickly. 

It offers calibnet FIL and tUSDFC, both via website and API, facilitating developing services, especially around FOC. It also provides mainnet FIL available via the website so that anyone can tinker outside of testnet. Both tUSDFC and mainnet FIL are unique, and no other faucet offers them. 

Forest Explorer requires no dedicated infrastructure, reducing maintenance costs, and implements several safety mechanisms, including rate limiting (global and per wallet) and classic bot protection.
end_user: Protocol developers, Filecoin builders and tinkerers
how_many_package_downloads: There are over a 1000 drips of FIL/tFIL/tUSDFC, enabling a number of Filecoin builders.
how_many_dependents: FOC builders use the calibnet FIL and tUSDFC faucet regularly. Others are using it on per-need basis.
